name: BHS Testing  - Pittsfield
info:
Located across the hall from Urgent Care. Check-in with staff in atrium. Anyone under age 18 should be accompanied by a parent or guardian. 

Walk-in vaccinations also available from 4pm-7:30pm at Urgent Care.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: West Newbury Town Annex
info: Johnson and Johnson Clinic for adults ages 18 and up that meet the current phase criteria.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: BHS Testing - North Adams
info: Please be sure to bring your ID and vaccination card if this is your second dose.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Hamilton Regional High School
address: Hamilton Regional High School, Hamilton MA, 01982
info: This vaccination clinic will be offering Pfizer vaccine and is for children and adults ages 12 and up.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: W.E.B. Dubois Regional Middle School
address: 313 Monument Valley Road, Great Barrington MA, 01230
info: EVERYONE IN MASSACHUSETTS IS ELIGIBLE. J&J clinic.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: W.E.B. Dubois Regional Middle School
address: 313 Monument Valley Road, Great Barrington MA, 01230
info: Moderna Clinic - everyone in Massachusetts 18+ is eligible for Moderna.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Rutland Public Library
info:
***Second Dose Clinic***
This will be a Pfizer 2nd dose clinic for anyone 16 years and older.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Citizen Center
vaccines: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine

special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Saint Vincent Hospital Vaccine Collaborative @ Worcester State University - Wellness Center
info:

Minors under the age of 18 MUST have a signed parental/legal guardian consent when arriving to the clinic
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
